about_the_game:
THE DANCER'S LULLABY

Explore, survive, decide and find the dancer. In this new survival horror experience every single decision you take matters. Each decision, each item you use and every door you open will have everlasting consequences bringing you a unique experience each time.

ABOUT

The world is dark and cruel, peace and order are the key for this world to function. Such peace is brought by the The Dancer's Lullaby, a sweet melody that keeps everything in order, but suddenly the lullaby stops and chaos is unleashed. Making you take the role of 3 porcelain dolls which can immedietly die by the weakest forces. Explore, survive and fight your fate, since your failure it's expected to be experienced multiple times and no one in this world expects you to succeed.

EXPLORATION

At some points of the story you will have to take a break and explore dangerous zones while solving puzzles. Find keys, use the knowledge you have collected until that moment, don't fall for any traps.

SURVIVAL

You will encounter horrifying monsters through the story, each one with unique mechanics which you will have to understand to survive. Fighting is not an option since the weakest of forces can cause your doll's death. Everything can kill you on this game but you can heal and take care of your dolls by finding items that can make your survival more easy... or harder.

DECISION

Throughout the game you will take different kind of decisions that will change the story and the way you and your doll experience this world. Decisions can change your destination, personality, relationships and more.

"The lullaby has stopped..."

content_descriptors.notes: Through the game you will play as porcelain dolls which are naked and can eventually be dressed with different items. The world of the The Dancer's Lullaby is cruel and unfair and you might encounter things such as: gore, suicide, extreme violence and similar.
